page.title: 10Leisure activities-Lydden
page.content: 1)My hobby is riding.I ride my pony called Min.She is 20 years old.She is a cross breed.I have won 36 rosettes and 5 medals,all on Min.My mum has a horse called Prince.He is a chestnut and he is 6 years old.My dad is a jockey and he rides in point to point races.I ride out with my friend Alison.My dad owns a farm in Lydden and I help by riding around the fields. 2)On Saturdays I go window shopping with my mum.Sometimes mum takes me to Russell Gardens and Bushy Ruff.It's lovely there but most of all I like to go in the car to see the horse. Sometimes we go on a day trip to France.When it's a nice day we go to the sea for a swim but mum hardly ever comes in,she says it is too cold.We also go to the swimming pool in Dover. We enjoy going for walks to places that we have never been to before.
